name: Kindled
description:
A top-down randomized rogue-lite bullet-hell where you play as an Oil Diver equipped with only a lantern. You must delve into the forgotten ruins under your oil rig to figure out why the oil has dried up.

This is a game made for a class.

Programming:
Joshua Armbrecht
Joshua Krenek

Art:
Sam Baeseman
Alex Stieby
